news.title: KI-Pionier Yann LeCun: Anthropic schürt KI-Ängste für eigene Zwecke

news.title: Introducing GPT-5.1 for developers
news.description: GPT-5.1 is now available in the API, bringing faster adaptive reasoning, extended prompt caching, improved coding performance, and new apply_patch and shell tools.
